DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate safety immunogenicity 2011-2012 formulation Fluzone Fluzone High-Dose vaccine participant age 65 year old . Objectives : - To describe safety Fluzone vaccine Fluzone High-Dose vaccine among adult ≥ 65 year age . - To describe immunogenicity Fluzone vaccine Fluzone High-Dose vaccine among adult ≥ 65 year age .
DOC.brief_title: Study Fluzone® Influenza Virus Vaccine 2011-2012 Formulation ( Intramuscular Route ) Among Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Historically , annual safety immunogenicity study Fluzone vaccine conduct US support license hold sanofi pasteur various country . Participants randomize receive dose either Fluzone® Fluzone® High-Dose vaccine follow safety immunogenicity . The duration participation trial approximately 1 month .
